local_intent: Lower until contact at the cloth after aligning and orienting, then verify contact before the push phase.
assumptions: Workspace is reachable and gripper state is non-blocking
coherence_with_global: Implements the pre-push segment: detect cloth, approach and align, set yaw=90, execute LowerUntilContact with slow, max_depth=0.02, force_threshold=10, then verify contact. Matches parameters and order from GLOBAL_BT and task description.
